name: Project Planner VS Code Extension
description: A VS Code extension for interactive project planning and TODO integration

subtasks.name: Setup Development Environment
subtasks.description: Set up the initial project structure and development tools

subtasks.name: Initialize VS Code Extension project
subtasks.description: Create the basic extension structure using VS Code's yeoman generator

subtasks.name: Set up TypeScript configuration
subtasks.description: Configure TypeScript for the project

subtasks.name: Set up testing framework
subtasks.description: Integrate a testing framework for TDD approach

subtasks.name: Implement Plan Viewer
subtasks.description: Create the interactive plan viewing and editing interface

subtasks.name: Design Plan Viewer UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and design for the Plan Viewer interface

subtasks.name: Implement Plan Viewer component
subtasks.description: Develop the React component for the Plan Viewer

subtasks.name: Integrate Plan Viewer with VS Code WebView
subtasks.description: Set up the WebView to host the Plan Viewer in VS Code

subtasks.name: Implement plan.json parsing and rendering
subtasks.description: Create functionality to read and display plan.json data

subtasks.name: Add interactive editing features
subtasks.description: Implement ability to add, edit, and delete tasks in the viewer

subtasks.name: Develop TODO Linter
subtasks.description: Create the TODO comment linting functionality

subtasks.name: Implement TODO parsing logic
subtasks.description: Develop functionality to parse TODO comments from code files

subtasks.name: Create plan.json comparison logic
subtasks.description: Develop logic to compare TODOs with tasks in plan.json

subtasks.name: Integrate linter with VS Code diagnostics
subtasks.description: Set up the linter to report issues through VS Code's diagnostic system

subtasks.name: Implement on-save linting
subtasks.description: Trigger linting process when a file is saved

subtasks.name: Extension Packaging and Distribution
subtasks.description: Prepare the extension for distribution

subtasks.name: Create extension icon and branding
subtasks.description: Design an icon and branding elements for the extension

subtasks.name: Write user documentation
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive user guide and API documentation

subtasks.name: Implement telemetry and error reporting
subtasks.description: Add anonymous usage tracking and error reporting

subtasks.name: Publish to VS Code Marketplace
subtasks.description: Prepare and submit the extension to the VS Code Marketplace
